name: Pencil Ponder
description:
Every time you beat the level something new is added. Over time the level gets more and more complete.

Controls: 

WASD / arrow keys to move

Space / x to jump

R to return to last checkpoint (if you get stuck)

There is also controller support, but it's kind of janky when it comes to climbing ladders. I also didn't have much time to do the audio, so it's just reused from other projects and doesn't fit the game well.
